content.question: The galactic city model was developed in response to the growth of suburbs and the need for a more complex model than the sector and concentric zone models. Which of the following is a strength of the galactic city model?

choices.label: It depicts a central business district.
It is based on the location of an international airport.
It is based on the decrease of urban sprawl.

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain the strengths, weaknesses, and limitations of different geographic models and theories in a specified context.
